name: The Sauce Boiz
description:
The Sauce Boiz is a game made for the Paint Jam 2021 over the weekend.

Theme: Campbell's Soup (Andy Warhol)

In this day and age, soup is a rarity. After Chef Bus loses his whole supply (thanks to Milo), The Sauce Boiz are on a great quest to find the GOLDEN soup to replace it all.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

~Klaudius the Destroyer perches on Galesong Hill. He overlooks the city that he destroyed 5000 years ago. He refers to himself in the third person as he stares down that wretched city. “Ah, what a world we have come too… ” he says aloud dramatically. Enter Milo, whose so stupid he could eat his own face “what the @$!# are you doing, Klaudious. Knock it off!” said the naive dino-saur-us of a mustard yellow. “And quit @$!#*&^ narrating everything I say!” In reality, Klaudious is actually just writing a resume

Klaudious: I need a job so bad...

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I had to cut a lot out in order to make the deadline but hopefully I will be able to finish all of the other parts we had originally planned on including soon.
